english.segment1: I see your eyes x-ray my insides. You're screaming death to me, waiting for me to die. I see your eyes x-ray my insides. The rockstar autopsy. You need what used to be. I see your eyes x-ray my insides. A stubborn glance, a chance to watch me all unwind. I see your eyes x-ray my insides. I wish you'd grab my hand cause we're falling fast.
english.segment2: You and me " looks like the last time we hold hands.
english.segment3: I want you back. I need you back.
english.segment4: I see your eyes x-ray my insides. This pedestal for me is getting way too high. I see your eyes x-ray my insides. So either watch me fall or watch me die. I see your eyes x-ray my insides. A stubborn glance, a chance to watch me all unwind. I see your eyes x-ray my insides. I wish I had your hand, cause we're falling fast.
english.segment5: You and me " looks like the last time we hold hands.
english.segment6: I want you back. I need you back.
english.segment7: X-ray my inside. Cause we're falling fast.
english.segment8: Looks like the last time we hold hands. Looks like the last time we hold hands. Looks like the last time. Looks like the last time.
